The 'improved clinch knot' is a knot that is used for securing a fishing line to
the fishing lure, but can also affix fishing line to a swivel, clip, or
artificial fly. This is a common knot used by most beginner/amateur/expert
fishers because of its simple tie and strong hold. When more pull is being
applied, the harder the knot turns into itself, increasing the strength of the
connection. Can be used with many kinds of line including mono-filament,
fluorocarbon, and braided fishing line.
